name: Planet Hope
description:
Isometric city builder / RTS. Play a number of missions across a variety of planets. Build your own and collect resources. Upgrade more buildings and progress your research tree.

This project was created in Unreal Engine 4 and is inspired by city builders like Simcity, and RTS titles like Total Annihilation, Supreme Commander and Planetary Annihilation.

All assets/mechanics made by me.
